Question: This person was also a member of the Order of DeMolay, a youth group affiliated with Freemasonry, but he never became a Freemason.
Hints: After graduating from Yale Law School, this person returned to Arkansas and became a law professor at the University of Arkansas.
This person won the 1992 presidential election (43.0 percent of the vote) against Republican incumbent George H W.
This person was inaugurated as the 42nd President of the United States on January 20, 1993.
